web_snippets: Mike Handcock is a keen musician and has written and played on 10 albums, several of which are on iTunes. Contribute to this page.
Mike Handcock. Biography. Mike Handcock is a globally celebrated Certified Speaking Professional and President of the Global Speakers Federation for 2025/26.
